plays.text: Goal scored by Petr Sykora unassisted
Penalty to Scott Gomez 2 minutes for Interference Martin Havlat

Penalty to Shane Hnidy 2 minutes for Holding the Stick John Madden
Goal scored by Jason Arnott assisted by Petr Sykora and Brian Rafalski
Penalty to Randy McKay 2 minutes for Charging Patrick Lalime
Penalty to Petr Sykora 2 minutes for Roughing Chris Neil
Penalty to Chris Neil 2 minutes for Roughing Petr Sykora
